document.heading: District of Columbia Alcoholic Beverage Control Act Temporary Amendment Act of 1987

history.narrative: Law 7-7, the “District of Columbia Alcoholic Beverage Control Act Temporary Amendment Act of 1987,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-142. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 17, 1987, and March 31, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 15, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-17 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
